content:
In just a day, the Russian military fired 14 times the settlements of Donetsk region

About thisreportedThe head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin in his telegram-channel, reports the Armyinform.

In the Novoukrainka the coal community damaged a non -residential premises.

In the Ocherin community, one person was killed and one was injured in Novoselivka first.

In the Marinsk community, one person is injured in Krasnogorivka. In Selidovo a person was injured, three administrative buildings and eight high -rise buildings were damaged.

Three agricultural buildings were damaged in Zukurin. The Kurakhiv community damaged four houses in Kurakhivka. In Mirnograd, a person was injured, three administrative buildings, eight high -rise buildings and two shops were injured. Two houses were damaged in Kalinov Novogrodiv TG.

In the Liman community, a school in thorns is re -fired. Under the fire of the outskirts of the Konstantinov community.

Five private homes and industrial buildings were damaged in the time community. Toretsk is damaged the house.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat the Russians hit the Kamikadze drone in the gas station in Nikopol.
title: 14 times a day: Rashists fired at Donetsk region again
description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin in his telegram channel, reports ...
author: Army Inform
